All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackendApplication
The main entry point of the Harmonia backend application.
ChangePasswordRequest
A class representing a request to change a user's password.
Channel
Channel entity representing a communication channel within a server.
ChannelController
REST controller for managing Channel entities.
ChannelRepository
Repository interface for managing Channel entities.
ChannelService
The ChannelService class provides methods for adding, listing, deleting, and editing channels in the system.
CreateUserRequest
A class representing a request to create a new user.
CredentialsPO
A class representing a user's login credentials.
DirectMessage
DirectMessage entity represents a direct message sent between two users.
DirectMessageController
This class is a REST controller for DirectMessage API endpoints.
DirectMessageRepository
This interface extends the Spring Data CrudRepository interface, and provides methods for accessing and manipulating DirectMessage objects in the database.
DirectMessageService
Service class for managing direct messages.
DirectMessagesMapper
A mapper class for creating DirectMessage objects from DMessageRequest and User objects.
DMessageRequest
A class representing a request to create a direct message.
DmessageResponse
A class representing a response to a direct message request.
PublicMessage
PublicMessage entity represents a public message sent in a channel.
PublicMessageController
This class represents a REST controller for handling public messages.
PublicMessageRepository
This interface extends the Spring Data CrudRepository and provides basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations for the PublicMessage entity.
PublicMessageService
Service class for managing public messages.
Server
Server entity represents a server in the application.
ServerController
The ServerController class handles HTTP requests related to server management.
ServerMember
The ServerMember class represents a user who is a member of a server in the Harmonia messaging platform.
ServerMemberController
This class represents a REST controller for handling server members.
ServerMemberMapper
A mapper class for creating ServerMember objects from ServerMemberRequest, User, and Server objects.
ServerMemberRepository
This interface extends the CrudRepository interface and provides additional methods to interact with the database table storing the ServerMember entities.
ServerMemberRequest
A class representing a request to add a member to a server.
ServerMemberService
The ServerMemberService class provides methods for adding, listing, and editing members in the servers.
ServerRepository
This interface defines the methods to interact with the "server" table in the database.
ServerResponse
A class representing a response to a server request.
ServerService
Service class for managing servers.
ServerServiceTest
This class contains JUnit tests for the ServerService class.
User
This class represents a user entity in the application.
UserConfig
Configuration class for user-related beans.
UserController
Rest controller for handling user-related HTTP requests.
UserMapper
A mapper class for creating User objects from CreateUserRequest objects.
UserRepository
Repository interface for managing User entities.
UserResponse
A class representing a response to a user request.
UserService
Service class for managing users.
